description: Try our easy to follow Seafood Tasting Plate recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Platter,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Prawn,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Christmas,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Seafood Tasting Plate Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, juiced (save 2 tbs juice for dressing)

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop avocado flesh out into a bowl, add lime juice and roughly mash with a fork. Stir through onion.
Cut the smoked salmon slices in half and place a spoonful of the avocado mixture into the centre of each piece. Roll up so that it resembles a flower.
Arrange the oysters, prawns and salmon flowers onto a serving platter.
For dressing; mix all ingredients together, transfer to a small bowl and serve with seafood and sprinkle with black pepper.
